goal.ch: 藉由以實務光電系統討論建立光學、光學機械、雷射、光電子學、熱物理之理論並結合實務所需使用之軟硬體工具概念，並以之為基礎討論實務與實驗上所需之光電工程能力
goal.en: By discussing and lecturing practical optoelectronic systems to establish optics, optomechanical, laser, optoelectronics and heat transfer phenomena to establish the theoretic fundamental concepts along with practically required hardware and software. With the established theoretic foundations, practical and experimental required optics and photonics engineering capability and hands-on laboratory capability will be discussed and realized through case study.

outline.ch:
1. 工具
數學與數值工具, 實驗概念
2. 光學
幾何光學, 電磁光學與光學材料, 波動光學, 光學元件與實務
3. 光學機械
光學機械設計、選擇、製作
4. 雷射
能階, 受激輻射, 共振腔, 雷射系統與應用
5. 輻射與檢測
光電元件, 光電元件電路與考量
6. 熱物理
量測與管理
7. 論文閱讀與撰寫
outline.en:
1. Common tools
Math tools, numerical tools and practical concepts
2. Optics
Geometrical optics, electromagnetism optics and opto-material, wave optics, optical element and practical concern.
3. Optomechanics
Design, selection and fabrication
4. Laser
Energy levels, stimulated emission, cavity, laser systems and applications
5. Radiation and detection
Optoelectronics and circuitry concerns
6. Heat transfer phenomena
Measurement and management
7. Papers
Searching, reading and writing
